column1: The Pit Room////The recognition TPR is receiving is well deserved. IMO
column2: this is the best BBQ in Houston proper right now. From its traditional fare (brisket
column5: chicken) to the creative and delectable tacos
column6: this little smokehouse is a well-oiled machine hitting on all cylinders. Great sides & friendly staff to boot. It's my current go-to resto and the first place I recommend to locals and visitors wanting a solid + authentic Texas BBQ experience. Congrats on the Top 50 Texas Monthly ranking and looking forward to all your future success.
